member.name: P:Vibration_Evaluation.My.Resources.Resources.Help_DataLog
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The ADIS16375 and ADIS164xx provide 32-bits of output data resolution for gyroscopes, accelerometers and the barometer (48x only). Each 32-bit sensor has two registers, that have 16 bits each. The register that ends in “OUT” represents the most significant 16-bits. For example: X_GYRO_OUT The register that ends in “LOW” represents the least significant 16-bits. For example: X_GYRO_LOW For the Data Capture, select the “OUT” register to record the 16-bit version of the output data OR select the “LOW” [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: Sets SPI signals to GPIO pins "5MHz" or SPI Peripheral pins "30MHz".

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.ExtTriggerWait
member.summary: Starts pin polling DIO3. Cancel by setting userCancel = True Calss Wait for Capture,

member.summary: Reads REC_INFO1 and REC_INFO2. Set properties of RecInfo object after cpature.

member.summary: Reads REC_CTRL. Sets RecordMode and powerDown property.

member.name: P:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.powerDownConfig
member.summary: Set in RecControl_Read(). REC_CTRL bit 7

member.name: P:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.RecordMode
member.summary: Stores only the configured capture mode. SR option is read from REC_INFO1

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.StartCmd(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker)
member.summary: Sends command bit 2^11.

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.WaitForCapture(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calls DrWait.Bypasses ReadBuffers if DataReady is False. TwoLevels is used for automatic mode captures.

member.summary: Converts G to 16 bit register values.

member.summary: Scales log2 data; /2048 , /fftAvg1, * RegScale/2; returns a log2 nolinear scale.

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.Log2toG(System.UInt32[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts register values (frequency domain Log2) to linear G.

member.summary: Returns an uinteger containing cal data as MMDDYYY

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.SampleRateGet(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the programmed sample rate in Hz.

member.summary: Reads RecInfo1 ,2 , DiagStat, ALM_SAT, ALM Peak , .. . Converts values to csv format. Returns rows of strings.

member.summary: Returns product number stored in PROD_ID

member.summary: software reset the DUT firmware through Command register

member.name: M:Vibration_Evaluation.ADcmXL021control.DrPollPinLow(System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker)
member.summary: Uses Spi.ReadPin. Cancel avalible if ran in background worker.
